title: Second Book
imageUrl: article.cart.product_item                              header.card__header                                  h1.prodcut__title #{product.title}                             .card__image                                  img(src=product.imageUrl, width="150px" , height="150px" ,alt="book")                             .card__content                                  h2.product__price #{product.price}$                                 p.product__description #{product.description}                             .card__actions                                 a(href=`\\products\\`+product.id) Details | #{product.id}                                 br                                 form(action="/add-to-cart" method="POST")                                      button.btn Add to Cart
